Description: case identification number assigned by MOH
Name of hospital of first admission
whether an epidemiological link with another case was established, either "yes", or "no"
whether the case was confirmed by laboratory testing, either TRUE or FALSE
case definition, defined in cleaning R script based on epilink, lab confirmation, and fever as either "Confirmed", "Suspect", or "To investigate"
presence of fever on admission, either 'yes' or 'no'
presence of chills on admission, either 'yes' or 'no'
presence of cough on admission, either 'yes' or 'no'
presence of aches on admission, either 'yes' or 'no'
presence of vomiting on admission, either 'yes' or 'no'
